content: Totally understand! One thing to do is just to own it. To say, “hey, this is me and what I’m all about and this is the message I want to spread in the world.” You will find many that link to your message if it is an inspiring one. And when you write for yourself, you’ll find no longer need the approval of others to find the power of your words. Are there any friends you could share it with, just to start out?
